name: Caro-Kann
description: The Caro-Kann is a simple but solid opening for black to fight for the center at low and high levels.

name: Ruy Lopez
description: One of the oldest and most traditional openings, offering a fight for control over the center.

name: Sicilian Defense
description: A sharp and aggressive opening for black, aiming to counter white's central pawn with a flank pawn.

name: French Defense
description: Black's response to 1.e4 with a central pawn move, offering a solid and flexible setup.

name: King's Indian Defense
description: A hypermodern opening where black allows white to build a strong central pawn structure, aiming to counterattack later.
